alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Henderson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:56PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henderson and northern Decatur Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 456 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Darden, or near Natchez Trace State Forest, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Natchez Trace State Forest, Parsons, Darden, Garrett, Jeannette, Beacon, Hickory Forks, Wilkinstown, Cozette, Bible Hill, Rock Hill and Chesterfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
